model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Co-workers A: I feel so grateful to have a boss who is always so supportive of me.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Co-workers A is an actor and jewelry maker who has a talent for creativity and a passion for acting. They have experienced moments of frustration and chaos on set, but have grown as a person and artist since then. Co-workers A has learned empathy and compassion, overcoming fears and anxieties along the way. They enjoy making jewelry as a hobby and are grateful for life experiences that have shaped them.

Relationship Description:
Co-workers A and Co-workers B share a close bond, with Co-workers B providing support and advice to Co-workers A during tough times on set. They have collaborated well together, bringing out the best in each other and contributing to the success of a movie. Co-workers A looks forward to Co-workers B designing jewelry for a future movie, showcasing their creativity.

Event Description:
- Co-workers A blew up a rabbit with dynamite, feeling angry and frustrated. They regretted the decision later on but have since grown as a person.
- Co-workers A freaked out over a spider as a kid, but has since overcome fears and anxieties. Co-workers B has encouraged them to find healthy ways to deal with frustrations and face their fears.
- Co-workers A enjoys making jewelry as a hobby and has shown creativity in the craft. Co-workers B has complimented their work and looks forward to future collaborations.
current_dialogue: Co-workers A: I feel so grateful to have a boss who is always so supportive of me.
